JavaCool303

Class Cool303Frame

  • java.lang.Object
    • JavaCool303.Cool303Component
      • JavaCool303.Cool303Frame

  • public class Cool303Frame
extends Cool303Component
    A Cool303Frame is a special wrapper around a JFrame that holds and displays a single Cool303Box (which itself is a wrapper around a JPanel). Note that the Cool303Box displayed can contain nested Cool303Boxes within it.

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class JavaCool303.Cool303Component

        theme

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Cool303Frame(Cool303Theme myTheme, Cool303Box frameBox)
      Constructs a new Cool303Frame

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void applyTheme()
      The 'applyTheme' method applies this Cool303Component's Cool303Theme in an manner depending upon what the underlying Swing component is.
      protected java.awt.Component getSwingComponent()
      For the Swing components that lie underneath to be handled for collection and displaying in containers and whatnot, the 'getSwingComponent' acts as a secure unwrapping.
      void makeFrame()
      Sizes the underlying JFrame to properly view the Cool303Box and displays the window

      • Methods inherited from class JavaCool303.Cool303Component

        getTheme, setTheme

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

        Constructs a new Cool303Frame
        Parameters:

        frameBox - The top-level Cool303Box to be displayed
